description: Associates the fraudsters with the watchlist specified in the same domain.

parameters.name: DomainId
parameters.description: The identifier of the domain that contains the fraudster.

parameters.name: FraudsterId
parameters.description: The identifier of the fraudster to be associated with the watchlist.

parameters.name: WatchlistId
parameters.description: The identifier of the watchlist you want to associate with the fraudster.

nested_items.name: Fraudster
nested_items.description: Contains all the information about a fraudster.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when Voice ID identified the fraudster.

nested_items.name: DomainId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the domain that contains the fraudster.

nested_items.name: GeneratedFraudsterId
nested_items.description: The service-generated identifier for the fraudster.

nested_items.name: WatchlistIds
nested_items.description: The identifier of the watchlists the fraudster is a part of.
